resources.string:
Indeed, nary was there a man who could 
be called upon to do so little, and yet 
actualize so little much less than that. 

Probably there was something that could 
have been done to change his fate.

Nonetheless he persevered, in the hopes
that some day, a miracle would transpire
to transform him from a rather under-
achieving boo into a resolute master of
circumstances, both his and the world's.

Be so bold as to cast a glance upon the
World's poorest, and be not relieved by
your relative wealth, but chastised by
the disparity between those with so much
when so many have so little.

This is a scrollview, so I should type 
enough to extend beyond the edge,
both of the screen and the comfort zone.
